descriptionHtml:
UPDATE-- gloves and heels no longer available. Out of my hands.  CHECK POSTS for any help with getting the rest of the outfit.




  Clothing retexures of existing mods with list of mods I have used to create Bloom charachter.



This mod is retextures of mods for a player to create Bloom from the TV show Winx Club. May not be fully lore friendly but is along same theme. This is more for fans of the show. Due to lack of Modeling skills at the moment I only have this outfit. I am going work on the wings from other seasons besides the 1st. It is a work in progress, and will be studying how to make models so I can create from scratch.
For fun may retex a rabbit mod to create Kiko.

Mods used in mashup bloom


-------PS for all who downloaded the mod before I found mistake I am very sorry. I put the wrong newmiller file down for gloves. I have fixed in required files and other places I made this error. again sorry. -----------------------------

Screenshots use a CBBE body. UNP should be ok as most is for UNP body. When using other tops the skirt clips with body, need both top and skirt to fix.

RECOMMENDED


http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624//? race menu mod helps

http://steamcommunity.com/groups/jackGa/discussions/0/864970667996734830/ turndown x race


HAIR----


http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//? apachii hair

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19623//? cazy demoness hairs

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6394//? rans hair


http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30642/? elwin pumps 2 -not needed but good mod anyway.
I kept in here as they are good mods, I have used them in other charachters.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
REQURED MODS

OUTFIT ---- Check mods on how to acquire.


http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14668/? maxwell outfit RETEX



http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24950//? animated moving wings RETEX Fairy wings light



http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36213//? hdt high heel system (realised my mistake as of 20/10/13) Not needed but handy to have.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38243/? UniqueAnimatedCrown_simplified (get this version)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Image from http://pura-luce.deviantart.com/art/Bloom-MW-Test-3D-Animated-252760412 For animated wing retex


Screenshots include Fox Cafe location.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21968//?

General thank you to all modders files who I have recommended and used in required files.

Special Thank you to anano, newmiller and badgremlin and Pura-lace (wings).



RECOMMENDED mods----

http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/42001/?

<--follow instructions and required lists.  alternate outfit.



http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56913/?   become a fairy, with flight.
author: Foxavyr
